item.title: TensorFlow莫凡
item.description: 这个项目之前已经做了好多次了,今天纯手打了一次 import tensorflow as tf import numpy as np # create data x_data=np.random.rand(100).astype(np.float32) y_data=x_data*0.1+0.3 ## create tensorflow structure start ## # 用随机的方式生成的随机数列,1代表一维结构(-1,1)

item.title: 吴恩达神经网络DeepLearning.ai
item.description: 注意你可能会产生这些问题 1.神经网络分多少层(layers) 2.每层含有多少个隐藏单元(hidden units) 3.学习速率是多少(learning rates)

密码学Information security
item.description: 我看的视频如下 然后以下是笔记 1.对称加密 A m-(+e)->C B m-(-e)<-C 对称解码 2.非对称加密 RSA加密算法基本原理 找出两个质数p,q n = p*q $ \phi(n) = (p-1)(q-1) $ 欧拉函数 4.公

item.title: UDP实现聊天软件
item.description: I.Socket基本流程 1.创建 upd_socket = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET,socket.SOCK_DGRAM) (可选)绑定 localaddr = ("",6789) udp_socket.bind(localaddr) 2.使用 udp_socket.sendto("xxxxx".encode("utf-8"),("192.168.33.11",7890)) # 必须encode才能发送 udp_socket.recvfrom(1024) 3.关闭套接字 upd_socket.close() 注意:一个端口号只能绑定一个

item.title: Unity2D中摄像头视角屏幕上的点坐标获取
item.description: 按照教程里的一步一步做了,先申请到两个三维向量但是赋值为 void CalculateSize() { Vector3 leftDown = new Vector3(0, 0); Vector3 rightUp = new Vector3(1, 1); Vector3 p1 = Camera.main.ViewportToWorldPoint(leftDown); Vector3 p2 = Camera.main.ViewportToWorldPoint(rightUp); ...... } 可是即便转化成了世界坐标,他的坐标

item.title: [English] Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.

item.title: [日本語] 敬語体系
item.description: 日本語の敬語体系は、一般に、大きく尊敬語・謙譲語・丁寧語に分類される。文化審議会国語分科会は、2007年2月に「敬語の指針」を答申し、これに

item.title: [中文] 《长恨歌》
item.description: 《长恨歌》是中国唐朝诗人白居易的一首长篇叙事诗。 第一段：贵妃受宠爱 汉皇重色思倾国，御宇多年求不得。杨家有女初长成，养在深闺人未识。 天生丽质难

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description:
center, right, left

## default
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")

{{% center %}}
## center
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")
{{% /center %}}

{{% right %}}
## right
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")
{{% /right %}}

{{% left %}}
## left
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")
{{% /left %}}

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: JS Flowchart Diagrams
item.description:
Usage

st=>start: Start|past:>http://www.google.com[blank]
e=>end: End:>http://www.google.com
op1=>operation: My Operation|past
op2=>operation: Stuff|current
sub1=>subroutine: My Subroutine|invalid
cond=>condition: Yes
or No?|approved:>http://www.google.com
c2=>condition: Good idea|rejected
io=>inputoutput: catch something...|request

st->op1(right)->cond
cond(yes, right)->c2
cond(no)->sub1(left)->op1
c2(yes)->io->e
c2(no)->op2->e

item.title: JS Sequence Diagrams
item.description:
Usage

Andrew->China: Says Hello
Note right of China: China thinks\nabout it
China-->Andrew: How are you?
Andrew->>China: I am good thanks!
